content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos to the full moon on that date.
content.summary: I cannot see it at the moment of the photo, i realize of the object when i saw the photo in my computer.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the country, so there is very little light.
i was planning to spend the evening just star gazing on the side yard. i had just sat down and when i first looked up, my eyes stopped at the top of the trees in front of me at about 45 degrees in the sky and i was staring at what seemed to be a boomarang at about the size of one and a half inches at arms length, was moving to the north. i would say that the trek, went from 45 degrees, thru 90 degrees and another 45 degrees in about 25 seconds and then the right side raised up and it turned to the left at about 30 degrees and went behind the trees there.
at first, i thought that it was an experimental aircraft that they wanted to hear if anyone could see it, then, a flock of geese, no geese sounds plus when it took the 30 turn and raised the right side of the craft which i believe geese wouldn't mimic.
it was the most amazing sight that i have ever seen in my life, i stood in my yard for 10 minutes, searching the sky with my jaw dropped!!!
content.summary: It had no light and no sound, a little lighter than the dark sky

content.detailedDescription: Saw a ball of light, larger and brighter than the southern star heading north. object was at a lower altitude than passenger jets out of florida and made no noise. i would see a jet about 10,000 feet about it and could hear the engines and see the collision lights. it appeared to jump forward as it was moving forward. the object stopped and rapidly got smaller in dia. very quickly until it was gone. it acted and appeared just like a sightling last year, but it was heading south. this makes three times in 1.5 years i have seen the same object all with no noise and brighter thatn surrounding stars. i never have time to get a camera due to the short duration of sighting. i'm well familiar with arcraft and their behavior and this was not a standard jet or helicopter. the sighting was in my back yard while walking my dogs.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw bright  ball of white light  erraticly moving north, stop, went straight up out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
i sighted this ufo in 1995.   at the time i was fixing cattle fence for a ranch near livermore, colorado,..Close to the forks restaurant.
   i first notice the craft as i stood-up to take a drink of water from a canteen.  the craft was a clasic cigar shaped craft, and was so large that it was hard to miss when i looked up to take a drink of water.   at first i thought i was seeing the goodyear blimp;.. as there is a blimp hangar only a few miles from where i was at the tme.    but upon closer inspection of the surrounding background,.. i quickly realized that the craft was much, much, larger than the goodyear blimp!
  the craft hovered silently, about 200 feet off the ground for a few minutes, and then slowly moved over the mountains to the west.
  at first i did not beleive what i was seeing, but soon realized that i was with-out a doubt looking at a cigar shaped ufo!    when i looked back up at the forks restaurant to see if anyone else was seeing what i was seeing,.. i was supprised to see that there was about a half dozen other people standing on the front pourch of the forks restaurant who were all pointing at the same thing..!!!
sadly,.. after a few minutes;.. the craft floated over the mountains to the south-west of livermore and left our field of view.

although i witnessed the sighting of this ufo over a decade ago;.. i still have vivid memories and even dreams of that event.   it was an event that changed my life..!!!   since that time, i have only told a few people about the event.   when i do mention the event to someone;.. i usually get the classic looks and scarcastic coments, etc.   so i finally stopped telling anyone about my sighting.   but was a few moments that are burned into my memory, that has changed my life, in a big, big way..!!!
content.summary: Seen at distance (apx. 1 mile)

content.detailedDescription: Spotted this odd shaped blob passing by about 1500 feet altitude, traveling with the wind west to east and about 1/4 mile away.  at first it looked like a large vulture that was soaring, but then as it got closer we could make out the shape better.  no noise, but my wife and i both noticed some sort of aura or energy field that seemed to distort the air right around this thing.  i then ran inside to get my camera while my wife kept watching.  got this one decent picture, but when i tried to zoom in on it my camera started acting erratically and then i lost track of the object.  called my brother that lives on the other end of town to see if he could see it, and he immediately did spot it and tried to photograph it but had the same problem with focusing.
content.summary: Odd shaped object floating by

content.detailedDescription: We werejust taking a drive listening to some music at about 8:00 last night when all of the sudden a triangle figure in the sky appeared its was blue and red lights that blinked on and off. when its flew it zig zzaged through the sky. we were on the highway going the opposite way it was going we tryed to turn around to get phootage but it just vanished
content.summary: Blue and red lights blinked on and off zig zaged through the skie

content.detailedDescription:
I spotted a bright star-like object heading east just after stepping outside on the back deck. i noticed it was escorted or observed by what appeared to be an aircraft bearing regular navigational lights, some distance from it. witnesses were present. a clip from the recording of the event will be provided but with the sound removed protecting witness(s).

i also want to note that i've noticed recent activity that raises suspicion i'm being watched or followed. whenever i leave out of town or somewhere regular, there are vehicles strategically idle and somewhat hidden on the side and begin to start driving some seconds as soon as i pass them. i have been told i'm being watched but i don't know who they are, with only some speculation.

are they mufon investigators and/or are the local air force personnel keeping track of me?
content.summary: Bright star-like object heading east, escorted by aircraft

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was just lights without shape, the light were symmetrical descending in a cone like shape like this ( < ) but the lines were broken up. the object was heading north, and was not going a fast speed it seemed. i only saw it when it appeared and then it flew across the sky for about 5 seconds then disappeared. it did not seem to far up in the stmosphere and was very clear. i have drew a picture of approdximetly what i saw, adn have dated it. i was very freaked out, and was only about two hosues away rfom my own, and after i watched it i ran home, and called my friend immediatly.
content.summary: It was jsut lights without shape, the light were symmetrical descending in a cone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work one day, beautiful day out with puffy clouds but sunny, irregular for wa weather. i am sorry, i can't remember the exact day but it was early in april 2011. the window in my office is quite large and faces north/north east. on occasion, i will look out the window and day dream (check out and de-stress)and i will observe the eagles and birds that fly over the field next to our building. 

it was about noon or so give or take a couple hours, i was looking up at a bird over the field next to us floating in the wind. but, off in the distance, in the snohomish valley i presume, behind the bird, i saw two fairly large circular objects (orbs?) way up in the sky! they were just hovering, which i though was very odd for airplane behavior, but they looked like they were either being lit up by the sun or had some type of glow about them. one was on top of the other and they were just floating in the sky fairly close together. 

now, i know there is an airport in the valley but these objects i felt were just not your normal run of the mill airplanes. these were no birds, being that far away they had to be large for me to view them. anyway, i kept observing them for about 4-5 minutes (total). the lower one was staying stationary and very still as the other one (on top) started to move south towards where i was. the other stationary one disappeared into the clouds as they passed by and i lost view and never saw it again. i observed the object floating towards me for about 3 more minutes and it seemed to just float in a very direct line of sight. eventually, it disappeared out of my window view. 

i sat there and couldn't believe what i saw but it was a round glowing circle. not an airplane with wings (i had also worked for boeing back in the day). i know what an airplane or a bird looks like and this was neither of them. it's been bothering me ever since i saw it. i hope that there is someone else out there that seen the same thing.
content.summary: Circular objects over the snohomish valley

content.detailedDescription:
i have had past ufo sightings, but that is not the reason that i am contacting you. i have had a lifetime of abductions that are leading to something i dont know.
   my whole life i have been attracted to this mattter. since a child i would go to the library and sign out books, watch shows, anyhting related to the topic. growing up i would have nightmares on a nightly bases about ufo's and aliens abducting me. i wrote it off as a dreams so i could sleep. i am going to be 32 in a couple days, but when i was 22-23-24 years old it started again. after i got married at that time( now divorced) it started to begin to be more of a reality. i started to have physical evidence such as burns, needle holes, bloody noses, bruises etc. i would become paralized and couldnt scream or move or do nothing. i woke one time to them around my bed, but for some reason i layed back down and went to sleep. i finaly told my wife at the time about what was going on.....And she knew. she had been having nighmares of them coming in and takeing me.
  i can tell when this is going to happen.....Almost a sixth sense to it. i dont want to sleep, i hear a humming outside my house etc etc. my girlfriend now has it happen to her, but will not talk about it. she has seen them take me....And have taken her.
  not sure what to do......Just want to know why
content.summary: Repeated abductions.

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of august 20th at approximately 9:15am i woke up to an incomming summer thunder storm.  since i had just moved to florida these types of storms were new to me and i went outside to get a good look and take some pictures.  i was standing right outside of my apartment which was on the water in the normandy isle part of miami just off of the 79th st. (j.F.K.) causeway looking south.

almost immediately i saw a a couple very bright spheres flying by my apartment.  they were not far away at all, and looked to be spheres.  its hard to estimate distances, but i would guess they were less than a 1/4 mile away and were approximately 30-40 feet in diameter.  they were very bright and completely silent.  they flew from the east horizon to the west on perfect straight lines.  

as i looked back to the east i could see more of them coming.  by the time it was over there must have been about 10 of them total.  all the same size with the same flight characterists.

when i saw them i immediately thought they were ufos of some sort.  they were easily not a plane/bird/blimp/helicopter etc.  while miami is a place where blimps and small planes fly around quite a bit advertising just about everything, there is nothing flown by man that is a sphere and completely silent.

as it happened i felt oddly calm.  since i was a kid i was always fasinated by the idea of ufos and i would have thought if i would ever see one i would have been anything but calm.  but as i stood there taking pictures and one video it all seemed very surreal.  if they would have made a noise it probably would have scared the hell out of me.

i eventually lost sight of them as they flew out of sight over the horizon.
content.summary: Multiple spheres flying by apartment

content.detailedDescription:
Two objects enter the atmosphere, going form dim to bright and dim again going south.
the neighbors my  wife and i see the event. clearly looked like two crafts entering the atmosphere.
i have seen this twice in hughson were i live in the last 5 years, and one time at pajaro dunes california from the beach.  the pajaro dunes event was one object .  each  times the objects go south and become dim and can no longer be seen, fast moving .
content.summary: Two objects enter the atmosphere, going form dim to bright and dim again going south.

content.detailedDescription: I am a nj ufo investigator of 30 years and i am friends with paty j. marcatillio(dr. ufo). i was at a friends house on the morning of april 9th 2011 in washington crossings pa, picking him up to head up to state college. while waiting, i went out to his porch to smoke a cigarette and was looking over the new veterans cematery in washington crossings. coming from trenton and moving west were two huge bright orange orbs moving horizontally across the sky. there is a microwave tower in my view across the field and the two orbs were 3/4 of the way up the tower. there appeared to be one following the other. they came into my sight and flew horizontally out of my sight within a matter of seconds. there were no flames or structure to be seen. these were not planes,jets,helicopters or balloons. these 2 orbs were contrasted by a clear blue sky as a background. my first thoughts were that of disbelief but bucks county has has a string of ufo's so its not all uncommon. after some research, i found no corresponding sightings or media stories. i did however speak to my friend and he stated he and his boss have been viewing 3 bright white orbs hoving over route 95 that were not orions belt, as they hovered, were considerably larger and hung lower in the night sky.
content.summary: 2 orange orbs,great size, moving at great speed

content.detailedDescription: Well again i saw many strange orbs and large ufos on the wired ny web cam site. i cant explain any of these objects that i captured here the other nite...All i can say is they show up all the time and they are there.. maybe its the bright lights of the city that attract them? who knows??
content.summary: Ufos over nyc

content.detailedDescription: i was talking with my sister when, i look out the wndow and i see what i think is an airplane, when it starts to hover above our barn. it does that for about thirty seconds to a minute. then it starts gliding toward us with no noise at all so we go out side to follow it. it seems like it's going to crash in our front lawn and goes right over a tree. it sailed over the trees and my sister and i thought it was going to crash into the lake. it was so close i could see the reflection in the water  and i noticed that it was definitly not an airplane. it was oval shaped, had red and yellow lights, had three spikes, and a faint turquis glow at the top of the craft. it is easter morning that i am writing this and i had the encounter last night.
content.summary: Oval shped, red and yellow lights, and had 3 spikes

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting on our balcony and i was looking into the night sky.  to my left, i noticed a distant light that first struck me as a possible shooting star, but as it moved i noticed there were about 3 lights beneath the craft and realized it wasn't a shooting star at all.  it moved so quickly and disappeared almost immediately.

the most interesting thing is that my husband and i witnessed another unidentifed hovering red orb that had an egg shape and would disappear and reappear.  it often changed shape from an oval to a sphere to an oblong shape.  this occurred only two days prior to this sighting.  2 in 1 week.
content.summary: Saw flying object wth lights on bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was about 4 years old, asleep in my parents bed. i woke up for no reason, and time seemed to pause. there was a bright light, and a tall, brown life form came into the room. it was speaking a different language but, for some reason, i could understand it. i wasn't sure what it was at first, since i was only a kid. the next thing i knew, i was in a bright, round room. there were other kids in the room, also. they did something with me, and i blacked out. i remember them saying something about "coming back in 12 earth years, to see how 'it' was doing and working out". i still don't know what "it" is. i remember a long, dirty hallway, and then, i was in the room again but standing up. they used this scanner thing on me, which kind of felt like a ton of tiny little bugs were crawling on me. i blacked out once again, but this time, i woke up standing in my parent's room. the light outside disappeared, and time started to go again. i had a bloody nose, but i was too terrified at what happened to try to even explain it to my parents. i've only told about three people about this experience, but it's been 11 years now and i'm kind of afraid on what they need to check up on and what they will do next.
content.summary: Abduction and sighting

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were headed south on hwy. 19, entering the city limits of a small town called slaughter,la., when i noticed through my wind sheild a smoky gray hollowed outline of a cross. it was huge. i couldn't believe my eyes. i asked my son "do you see that" he replied, "yes ma'am",then about the time he answered,i noticed a large orange cross just to the left(east)of the smoky outline, it was even bigger than the outline, the size of the moon. it glowed like the sun when it sets. it was scary yet amazing. i didn't know what ot make of it, i was dumbfounded,neither one of us thought to use our cell phone cameras. i said what is that? my son replied, "the mother ship." it moved slowly at first. then it began to pick up speed. it never lost it's shape it just floated.I tried to keep up with it but due to law enforcement of speed limit in town i could only observe it at 45 mi. speed limit. we watched it as it went over some tree tops still headed east,the smoky outline disappeared. there were no sounds. 

*can provide drawing
content.summary: A smoky gray outline of a cross and to the left of it a large orange cross

content.detailedDescription:
These creatures have been seen by the two male reisdents of the house.  the creatures are short, whiter than white, long tail, looked like it had a cat-faced mouth.  the creature had real pointed legs, walking on the two back legs.  when you try to hit or touch the creatures, you are stunned and cannot move, until the creature has moved past.  no noise!  we do not know when the thing is coming but this has been going for at least a year.  sometimes varied but much the same.  they touch my dad on his leg, his knee, they seem to jump on the beds or land on the beds, because you can feel the movement.  they mess with me but it is like i am knocked out and when i wake up, i cannot remember.  and i am not a drinker or druggie, so i cannot imagine what is going on to me.  

now i have a dog, a pitbull, that i thought would scare these things away but they freak my dog out and he is gotten so hyper that i have to get the dog some anti nerve medicine.  

sometimes there is more than one creature in the house. they come to the house on wednesday afternoons and stay until thursday night.  sometimes we can hear boxes drug across the floor but when i get up and check, there is nothing.  this week i found weeds and grass from the outside bushes by the back door, on the patio deck.  there was no reason for that to be there!  

i have two movie cameras, set on night vision, set up and whatever these things are, they manage to avoid getting caught.  one night i was sleeping, that was on camera.  all of a sudden my feet started moving up and down, and it was not me doing it.  but nothing was caught on the camera other than my feet and me sleeping.
content.summary: Reptilian like creatures come into the house, though locked doors and security system.

content.detailedDescription: It was time for bed so i took the dog out.I was walking down the walkway too the back yard it was a clear night i could see the stars i looked right then left and i saw a orange light in the distance it looked like a  brite star i watched it getting closer and though it might bee a shooting star but i was wrong. i have see a shooting star before this was no shooting star. it was a glowing orange disk i figured it was glowning orange from being so hot because it was travilling about 1,000 miles an hour.Im not an expert but i cuncider my self a pretty good judge of miles per hour. it was only 200 feet in front of me so i got a very good look at it. it only took it 5 seconds to traville about 20 miles thats as far as you can see if you look from left to right.I thought it was amazing.If i would have had a camara i could have taken a pitcher,i was astonished,i thought no one would belive me i ran back into and told my wife what i saw.She said that i should take the camara with me the next time i go out.And for the next two weeks i did but never saw any thing again.
content.summary: Glowing orange disk travilling at a very high speed aprocsimetly 1000 miles

content.detailedDescription: Stationary star like object - starts moving north, very faint light coming from object not blinking just steady light looked to be very high altitude craft. once it started moving we noticed a very bright beam of light came out of craft like a spotlight for the duration of about five sec. then back to low light and came to a stop far off. then after about 2 min. the craft got brighter & looked as if it was going straight up into space until we couldnt see it anymore or the light could have just got bright and then demed out. about ten min. later we saw two star like objects steady light not blinking intersec, they looked like they were actually going to hit eachother. these were also at very high altitude. they crossed pathes at same time like they were going to hit and we watched them until they faded out of view. we always seem to see this activity close to or right after the eight oclock hour pm.
content.summary: Two events same night. stationary star like object starts moving north & two intersecting star like objects.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting on our porch and saw a single orange round light coming toward us from the philadelphia area toward the jersey area.  we got our binoculars and watched as it passed.  it was completely silent.  we got our camera out and sure enough over a short period of time, two more objects came over head within about an hours period of time.  by the time the third one passed over, one of our neighbors was sitting outside with us and he witnessed the same thing.  it definately wasn't any type of plane or anything that we are familiar with.  we did try to take photos, but the photos did not come out.  also worth mentioning, we very often see a very bright light in the same exact spot in the sky the stay put for about an hour or so and then will slowly move toward the right of where we are looking until it disappears.  this light appears over the oxford valley mall area and heads toward the right of the area.  it's not as close as the mall, but that is the direction it appears from.  we were not afraid.  we were very curious and hoped to video/photo objects - but like i said, they didn't come out.  they were completely silent.
content.summary: Orange colored, silent

content.detailedDescription:
My 26 year old son and his wife were driiving north on belvoir road near plymouth road intersection,in a brand new 
less than 100 miles on odom)toyota corolla when my son decided to take a few pictures out the window and this is what was seen when reviewing.The actual picture on the camera had more visible objects,at least 10 to 20 more.To put it in todays words"there was alot going on up in the sky".When he took the picture neither he nor his wife noticed anything unusual in the sky.I have shown this to other people and got mixed viewpoints from being real ufo's or just plain dirt on windshield.One man i showed picture to came back later with numerous older published photos showing three similar objects in identical formation.A few days after picture i sat in the front seat of the toyota and looked through windshield at every possible angle and there was no dirt marks or deformities in window.The car had not been washed from the time of photo up to the time i examined windshield.
content.summary: Unseen to naked eye?

content.detailedDescription:
I am sorry to come to the point to report the event so much time after it happened...

i live in a village (approx. 2000 residents) 25 km from budapest. it was a winter evening (2008 or 2009) around 6 to 7 pm (fully dark). it was overcast with cloud base at approx 100 m (300 ft).

i drove home from work, parked my car in the garage and went up the (outside) stairs to enter my house. after a few steps on the stairs i could see over the garage and noticed a strange thing.

dim blueish green light sources on a circular pattern, about 10 pcs, rotating slowly around the center, about half rotation per sec. it seemed as they were on the bottom of a circular object, which is spinning horizontally. i could not see the object itself, so unsure about its shape, because there was not any backlight. i could just see the lights on its bottom. it was about 300 m away from me and with the little reference to other objects (some tall trees) i estimate its diameter to be 15 m, and its altitude 50 m over the land. there is a main railway line at the edge of the village and it seemed a bit farther than that, over the lands.

it was hovering, no movement and the rotation was also stable. the lights were also stable in color and brightness. first i thought someone was playing with kind of a disco laser light, which would probably project similarly on a very smooth cloud base. but after about 5 seconds it started to move left (east) in a way what was very surprising to me and excluded the disco light possibility. first it tipped left about 20 to 30 deg and started to move in that direction. then it tipped right the same amount, and continued this slow left-right tipping, while moving slowly to east (50 kmh?), and out of my sight (other buildings, trees and terrain blocking sight).

i told my wife what i just saw and to my workmates next day. i am an electrical engineer and have a ppl and tried to identify the object based on my knowledge, but i still cannot explain it.
content.summary: Slowly rotating lights, moving slowly at night

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8-9pm.(edt)my brother and i were heading to a friendly poker game at a friends home.
after stoping at a stop light facing south, roughly 1 mile from the destination.
looking south\east, i spoted a glaring orb, light orange in color that first looked like a plane over the house lines, i then strangely realised that it was not blinking its routine lights.
as we began driving down south i lost sight of the ufo. and then we arrived at the home.
we parked infront on the curb, facing west.
as i got out and turned around to face east, i spotted something far and above, from what it looked like, it was the rear view of a low plane heading away from me,which had red like lights which was normal for aircraft at this area. i then quciky realised it was not a plane nor a man made vehicle. the ufo was disk shaped with like i mentioned red lights with glaring black lights pulsating in the ring of the disk. the ufo appeared to be about 10k away and 10k high.  it didnt move for the entire duration, it remained in one spot.
as me and my brother stood there i told my brother if he can see that and he shrugged it saying yea', we then stood for 1 min just staring at it.
 i quickly called both friends to come out and view this ufo.
as they came out we were all in awe of being in the presense of a ufo.
we didnt feel anything physical as we just stood and look at it debating whether were tripping. it then lightly vanished to the stars as we lost sight of it.
content.summary: What first appeared as a plane, which i lost view of, then appeared as a disk shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Object seen[light orbs].Years ago.Objects found that burnt the skin.3 fingered glove cleaved in half,not palm to back but laterally.Instances of wtf just happened and it fell out of the memory for those around me.They would still say- what happened there? and w/in a day or two not know wtf i was talking about.
i believe i have been visited.I do not like it. i do not want to be known. the truth is out there,someone needs to find it.I truly am afraid to disclose.I am afraid of our so called government and the repercussions that may come.My life is somewhat sunk already through normal means.I seek not to gain,but to potentially give another part to the puzzle.Obviously the gov. sees all.I know that the effect on my life has been long lasting.Nary a word said.I just need to tell someone the details,someone that gets it. i cant write,i'm told i'm smart,sharp,intelligent,whatever, and don't believe it,i'm not stupid either,we all have our shortfalls,yes i have issues.You just need to know there may be a place that deep, true,hard investigation, may give you something.
i really can't type.This is a struggle for me. i hope you can see that even though my words are worthless,i may be able to send you in a fruitful direction. some things have happened!I may dream to much or think to much,but i do have people that can be found that were there.Have know idea what they would say.If kelly and i found the glove there has to be more there.Took me an hour to type this.Hard for me,but a 3rd scale glove w/3 fingers and burns your hands/dropped it, came back 20 minutes later w/ a glove on and it is gone.-strange.Glowing orb drops behind the mountains -slowly-gone in a flash,same area.Years later, high school dance date asks if i had heard of the miller creek lights.I said no.She described to me exactly what i had seen earlier in my life.There is just to much for me to put down here.I need someone to look at this.Either prove me crazy or find a piece of the puzzle.I cannot do it this way,i need to talk direct w/ someone.
to describe any further i would have to divulge more info than i prefer.Multiple events.Not many,just enough that i know something is going on outside of what we would generally refer to as normal.Not saying it's aliens, but it sure ain't human either.The gov. has the wool pulled so far over our eyes we don't even know we are being rodgered.
content.summary: Things are not right over the course of years.Things  i can not tell anyone.

content.detailedDescription: To mufon investigators,me and my friend were sitting in the car waiting for my friends parents who were in the store to come out.We were in bridgeport ,ct and were going to see a movie.I was looking out the passenger window at the coat when i noticed one light that was brighter then the other stars.I saw it moving horizontally and dropped down until i couldn't see it anymore and then it popped back up to the same exact level it was before it had dropped and it kept doing that about 4 times and then i said to my friend "oh look a ufo" i was only kidding but then as we continued to watch i saw it coming directly towards us taking the shape of a football.It continued to come all the way to our position and slowed down on approach to a crawl until it was directly over us and it stopped and was hovering silently. my friend was terrified and hid under the dashboard and i jumped out of the car and said "i gotta get a look at this".I stood there with my arms out and said "look you found me what do you want your scaring us" it was round when i looked straight up at it.It had to be a mile wide,there was a light sequence going counter clock wise around the perimeter. even though it was night time i could still see the color which was a polished charcoal.It was totally silent and still even though it was so close to us.The lights lit up one by one except for the one black square that didn't light.As it was still hovering i threaten it and threw rocks at it because i thought i could hit it,but they didn't hit it at all it was out of reach as if it knew.People were running out of the store and between cars passed me as i yelled "look up,look up" people were running for their lives because they had evidently seen it already.I dropped the rock i was holding staring at it memorized and in disbelief. it was still just hovering there.It felt as if it was there because of me and my comment about "look a ufo".I was yelling at it with aggression and then complimented how nice the ship looked. i said looking up at it you have a beautiful ship there.There were no lines or markings on it,and it was obvious that it was not from this planet.It started to slowly move past me ,stopped..Tilted itself upward slightly and then i saw it was football shaped. then it disappeared so fast that i only saw a blur from it's own light.It was just that fast that it happen.If i blinked i would have missed it.I was in shock but i knew what i saw and i knew what it was. it was to big,perfect,silent. it was weird because everyone around was freaking out and scared but for some reason i was not i was intrigued.I felt that i knew that it was being operated by an extremely  intelligent control.The strangest part of all of this is that i know that it understood me because as soon as i said look a ufo it came directly to me.Previous to that it was going up and down in that same pattern as i stated before as if it was working or doing something.I feel unnerved because i feel that it knows a lot about us.I don't know why it came to me? the only thing that i can guess is my voice?! i just don't know why me, but my friend was with me i was 17 he was 16.It felt like it was looking at me,something i will never never forget or want to forget.
content.summary: Disk-like w/ counterclockwise chaser lights one light at a time.One black square did not light up,lights skipped that square fast sequence lights .Silent ,mile wide aprrox.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch with grandmother when we noticed to the northwest of our location in midvale, which appeared to be to the west of salt lake city a fireball, glowing a red-orange and making some strange maneuvers at high speed. not aircraft. made right-angle changes in maneuvers without slowing down. we observed it for about 5 minutes. i don't know if the red-orange color was the craft itself or the sun reflecting off the object. the sun would have started going down when we saw it & no, it definitely wasn't the sun. at the time i was slightly familiar with ufo stories and believed that was what we observed. a number of years ago i had a paperback which had this sighting detailed and the author also stated that this ufo was probably the same one that came down close to an electrical substation somewhere in nevada. unfortunately, i no longer can locate the paperback and would dearly love to find it or own it again. this was the first time i observed a ufo. i have had a second sighting, in 1975 while flying in a commercial plane, but i'm more interested in the one in 1962. would appreciate whatever you can locate in your files.
content.summary: Fireball making erratic changes in flight at accelerated speed.

content.detailedDescription:
It was somewhere around august 15th on a sunday in 1978. i remember it well because of a number of memorable events that took place in my life that year. i lived in a town in northeast ohio known as twinsburg. i moved there from cleveland with my parents and siblings in 1963, i was ten years old. 1978 was the very best and very worst year of my life. in january of that year my third child was born, a daughter, who is now a ph.D candidate at a large and very prominent new england university. that year proved to be the warmest january on record to that date. on january 27 of that year the temperature was an unseasonably warm 58 degrees as i recall. later that same day the temperature dropped 30 degrees in an hour, the winds that brought the temperature change also brought something more ominous. a blizzard caught most northeast ohioans off guard and left everyone snowed in. the next morning my brother came to my house to tell me that there was a fire at my parents home and one of my brothers was caught in the blaze and had suffered some injuries. everyone met at my second oldest brother's home and made preparations to go to the hospital in nearby akron, ohio where he died five days later. that winter was the coldest on record, there had been news reports of wind chills at 60 below zero. and it caused scientist to speculate that we were headed backward into a new ice age. the snow stayed until mid april as snowstorm upon snowstorm left snow piled as high as 16 feet in some areas. i am the oldest of 10 children. and that was the first time any of us had been sick or in seriously ill health. i was 25 years old at the time and i was angry. angry mostly at god and the weather because, my brother was the third born and nothing should happen to anyone who was only 20 years old. later that year my wife and i put a bid on a house and won, we were on our way to a home in suburban cleveland, and for the second time that year something extremely good happened to me and it looked like the curse had been lifted from my family. we were to take possession of that house on the 28th of august in 1978. 
i told you this story to show a progression or timeline of events that took place in my life that year, in hopes that you would be able to realize why events in my life remain emblazoned in my memory for the rest of my life. 
my wife grew up in rural west farmington, ohio some thirty miles or more from twinsburg. her parents and siblings met me at their church on a sunday when my church was visiting. we were married in 1974 and had a total of 5 children born to our union.
that august my wife's parents were visiting mississippi and louisiana, where they were born and lived until shortly after they were married.
before embarking on this vacation, the first one they took by themselves, since moving to ohio. their children were getting older and did not want to accompany their parents that year. my in laws were somewhat apprehensive about leaving them alone, as my wife was the oldest of eight children and was herself only 22 years old at that time. they asked us if we would chaperon a party the kids were planning that weekend to sort of commemorate the end of summer. we agreed and moved in with them for the weekend. my wife bundled our children into the car along with my 10 year old sister and left for her parents home on friday. i had to work on friday and check in at work on saturday to reconcile some accounts. i left twinsburg on saturday in my car, a 1967 pontiac firebird, outfitted for the track but still street legal. i stopped by my parents home before leaving to pick up 2 of my brothers that were invited to the party. the next day, sunday proved to be a clear warm august night. we left west farmington at about 9:00 pm that evening and arrived at a crossroad of route 82 and route 44 in mantua ohio. i always considered that junction to be the halfway point of our trip. because the town of mantua was very rural and a farming community there was very little traffic especially after 9 o'clock in the evening. this night was different there was a line of cars sitting at the light and we pulled into line with the rest of the cars and we were about the fourth or fifth car in line. i noticed a woman at the head of the line outside of her car with the hood up and her car appeared to be lifeless. she had some sort of object in her hand she kept hitting the object with her hand and her knee, it may have been a flashlight but we were too far behind to see it clearly. my wife and one of my brothers, my sister and children were a car behind us, somehow a car managed to get between us, my wife was not an aggressive driver like i was. my brother asked me what the red object was circling the light. i told him it that i noticed it and thought it might be a child with some sort of remote controlled helicopter or some sort of toy. i thought that because as it circled the traffic light it also moved up and down at the same time. i also remember thinking at that time that i sure would love to have that same toy. i made a mental note to go to our local toys r us store to inquire about buying one. as we waited for the light to change i remember a feeling of calmness like i never felt before, remember i was 25 at the time and given to bouts of road rage at times. the object left and the womans car started up while she was still outside her car and she got in and drove away. i was relieved because i would not have to stop and help her and we could continue our journey home. after driving about a quarter of a mile we came to a stand of trees on the south side of the street. i knew that there was an opening at the end of that stand of trees that was more than a half mile away from our current position. there was a red light at the end of the trees that was just above the line of trees. my brother again asked what the light was. because it was larger and stationary i told him it was likely to be an oil derrick or someone may have sold the mineral rights to a gas company, although i could not remember seeing one on our way to my in laws, but, it was 1978 and four years after the "arab oil embargo" and everyone was digging for oil which was like striking gold in those days. as we drove closer to the stand of trees the red light we saw was pulsing and seemed to be redder and brighter than any light i had ever seen in my lifetime. when we came to the end of the trees the car ahead of us pulled over, what i saw on the south side of route 82 made me pull over behind that gentleman and exit my car, my brother got out also. right across the street from us, hanging in the air was an object of immense proportions. and i say hanging because it was not on the ground, it was not moving and it was not making any noise. it was hanging as if on a string it was oval shaped and it was bigger than a house ,almost the size of a barn and it had lights, boy did it have lights, it was oval shaped and almost spherical. the light were red white and blue and they appeared to be moving around the object with a life of their own. just as we got out to view the object my wife was pulling over behind us and as my brother and i stood next to my car, my wife yelled out to me saying "don't go over there," i looked at her and again she yelled "don't go over there." she did not have to worry, my calmness seemed to have left me and was replaced by fear. fear and wonder. at that moment the guy in the car ahead of us got back in his car and left in a hurry. at the same time the object seemed to open some sort of trap door or window and a light came out beneath it and moved around the ground searching for something, the light was not an ordinary light, it was white light and brighter than any light i have ever seen before or since. the beam was narrow at the top and became progressively wider as it neared the ground, until it splashed the ground in a perfect circle about the size of a mirror attached to a bedroom dresser. whatever the object was searching for it must have found it because that was when the object moved. it descended just as if it were on a string to the place where the searchlight stopped. my brother chose that moment to be a hero, he began to run across the street toward the object. "come back here!" i shouted, that was when he turned around and came back to the car. "let's go, let's go," my wife was almost screaming and in her panic, and given my brothers daring act, i came back to my senses and realized i had a choice, i could stay and see what would happen next, or, i could take caution and not put my family at risk, i could get in my car and go home. as we pulled back onto route 82 toward home my brother said "why did you stop me? i wanted to see it." i said "david, if i come back home without you, there's no telling what mom will say or do to me, i don't want to tell her she has just lost another son to what, aliens, a spaceship?" he looked at me and said i still wanted to see." i waited a moment and said "look david, if they can come here and we can't go there, i think it's best if we just leave them be," i thought to myself if they wanted us would i be able to stop them? i shuddered at the realization that i would probably have been helpless to stop them. i realized that we were still not out of the woods, we were not home. 
when we finally made it home i asked everyone to keep it to themselves when we get inside, because if you tell people what you saw, they will call you crazy. i wasted my breath issuing that warning, as soon as we got inside everyone began talking at once relating what we saw. i remember my mother sitting in her favorite chair and telling us that we all needed to have our heads examined.
that was thirty three years ago, a number of things have transpired over the years. i am no longer with my first wife i have remarried, i have lived in other states, and have lost 2 more brothers to tragedy, including my brother who rode with my wife that night. my brother who rode with me says he cannot remember the incident. my mother passed away in 2001, and my dad died in 2008, my grandmother passed away this year at the age of 102. i have enjoyed raising my children and beamed with pride as they accomplished goals they set for themselves, and i now have 5 grandchildren, 3 boys and 2 girls. i am retired and living in the southwest of this great country. i think about that night often, i have recurring dreams of ufo's and i'm not so quick to dismiss sightings by others, and anytime i hear people on the news or documentaries trying to explain away peoples' sightings i think of shakespeare's words uttered by puck in "a mid summer night's dream" and they are "lord what fools these mortals be."   
one thing keeps nagging away at me, it is the one thing i and my ex wife have never shared with anyone else, and that is as we got ready to go to bed that evening i asked my wife if she had the time. she asked, why didn't i have my watch? "i said sure i do, but according to the clock in the kitchen my watch is seven minutes slow." she looked at me with a stone expression on her face and said, "mine is too" "mine is too." sometime in 1977 stephen spielberg directed the movie "close encounters of the third kind," i never watched the movie until sometime in the 1990's and the mother ship shown at the end of that movie looked almost exactly as the object we witnessed on that warm night in august of 1978.
content.summary: Two part sighting

content.detailedDescription:
On both april 21 and april 22, 2011, i went outside to breathe fresh air and i saw what resembled a star in the northwest sky west of the airport.  i am familiar with the landing patterns of the airplanes as well as constellations; and whichever planets are present in the sky during the year, as i spend a lot of time outside at night.  this object pulsated:  white, blue and red, but didn't blink.  it just seemed to change colors but stayed lit the whole time.  the first night, i watched it hover for about an hour; it seemed to drift further northwest as the hour went by, but much faster than the corresponding stars surrounding it.  after that time, it disappeared behind houses and i went back inside.  on april 22nd, i again returned outside to find it in the same place that i had discovered it the night before; still changing colors from white, to blue, to red.  however this time, there appeared to be interest from other parties, as there seemed to be several planes that flew near it as if the pilots were curious as to what it was.  the object didn't seem to care at all, but the planes didn't stick around for long.  it was easy to tell the difference between the small planes and this object, as the planes' lights were blinking and the object's lights were not.  it followed its "drifting" trajectory--the same as the night before--until it disappeared out of my view again behind houses on the horizon.  the object was too far away to affect me in any way, and too far away to get a decent video of it.  i will try tomorrow to see if i can obtain some sort of recording. my cell phone couldn't take a decent image.

i report this because upon reading earlier submissions from april 18 and 20th, it appeared that another person saw this same object.  i wanted to let him know that he was not alone and if he's crazy, then so am i.
content.summary: Second night in a row -- confirming another report
